users.about:
Dr. Charalampos Bratsasis the founder of the Greek Chapter of the Open Knowledge Foundation and the President of its Administration Board. He has extensive experience in Semantic Web with a focus on Linked Open Data Internationalization and Ontology engineering. He has been involved in 10 EU research projects. He is currently a faculty member of the Master in Web Science with the Mathematical Department of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki. He leads the R&D efforts of the Greek Linked Open Data which
is currently part of the overall global 2014 LOD cloud with the following datasets: Greek DBpedia, Hellenic Police, Hellenic Fire Brigade, Public Library of Veroia, GreeK Wordnet) His main areas of interest are: Data Mining and algorithms, Semantic Web, Social Semantic Web, Internationalization of Linked Data (coordinator of Greek DBPedia), Applications of Artificial Intelligence, Neuroinformatics, as well as, Linked Education. He is an author in 2 theses, 6 book chapters, 11 articles in journals, and more than 30 articles published in International conference proceedings. He has serve as a program committee member for more than 15 conferences and acted as a reviewer in 7 international journals.
users.name: cbratsas

users.about:
Currently a Data Researcher & Project Manager within Insight Centre for Data Analytics of NUIG. MSc degrees in Web Science & Communication Systems Engineering as well as several certifications. 11 years of experience includes a broad range of international, multicultural positions in research, consulting, project management, software development & testing. There is significant experience with several telecom software companies on various roles, as well as with research institutes on data science/analytics & the public administration on Smart City technology consulting.
Bring an interesting blend of expertise as well as a true passion for data. Much of personal work is focused on the Semantic Web & Linked Open Data but main interests also include Big Data, the Internet of Everything, NLP, Smart Cities & Project Management.
users.name: parapontisj
